name: Line divider
help: This component helps you to add a line divider to separate and add extra spacing between components.

width.name: Width
width.help: Allows to define the width that the section will have.

spacing.name: Spacing
spacing.help: Allows to define the amount of separating space that the section will have.

color.name: Line color
color.help: Allows to modify the color of the divisory line.
